author: markt
msg: Redefine the globalXsltFile initialisation parameter of the DefaultServlet as relative to CATALINA_BASE/conf or CATALINA_HOME/conf.
Prevent user supplied XSLTs used by the DefaultServlet from defining external entities.
This is the fix for CVE-2014-0096

author: sebb
msg: Check that localhost resolves as expected
